Content: [telegram] <emmettttt> 😅😅😅 well uh I do now. I’m at 97.8% now.. so I guess I’ll just let it finish 😂 320GB internet usage the last 3 days. With lite mode is there any difference compared to native mode as far as my receive address and such? (re @PTYX11: You know you can use lite mode and it's instant?)

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <PTYX11> SPV or Lite mode does not generate change addresses. So there is no need to store a wallet.dat with multiple privatekeys. With litemode you get a mnemonic seed which allows you to restore your funds in any Komodo compatible wallet (re @emmettttt: 😅😅😅 well uh I do now. I’m at 97.8% now.. so I guess I’ll just let it finish 😂 320GB internet usage the last 3 days. With lite mode is there any difference compared to native mode as far as my receive address and such?)

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <PTYX11> I saw your messages about the download but i assumed you knew (re @emmettttt: 😅😅😅 well uh I do now. Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <PTYX11> it's not convenient but that's how full nodes are setup

Content: [telegram] <PTYX11> From what I understand is that ledger made the update and now you can get rewards from transactions using Ledger. You won't lose the reward anymore (re @DrgnAngel: I also updated my ledger to latest firmware and downloaded the latest KMD app from ledger live.)

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <PTYX11> There are two wallets that have claim buttons. One of them is app.magnumwallet.co and https://atomiclabs.github.io/ledger-kmd-reward-claim/

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <zillamonster> You might need to make a transaction to set the nlocktime so your 10 kmd begins getting interest

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <zillamonster> It's possible that your utxo didn't have the nlocktime set and therefore was not gaining rewards

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <zillamonster> All you need to do is copy your kmd address, send the total balance from your wallet (Magnum or ledger live) to the same address and it should set the nlocktime now

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <DrgnAngel> Binance is still showing the transition as Processing.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <DrgnAngel> Also the send total balance from me to me is that a one time thing or I have to do this all the time?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <zillamonster> You must do once a month (re @DrgnAngel: Also the send total balance from me to me is that a one time thing or I have to do this all the time?)

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <zillamonster> This is what "claiming" reward means. It is a transaction with the full balance to yourself. It resets the utxo and you begin making rewards again. Before you had to do once a year. Komodo changed it to once a month.

Author: Gateway#3763
